name: Balanced Attack (V)
Lore: 'Alliance starfighter pilots cross-train with other starship types to maximize combat efficiency.',
Text: 'If your corvette, cruiser, and frigate are in battle together, cancel an opponent''s non-[Immune to Sense] Interrupt. OR Deploy a frigate (deploys -2) from Reserve Deck to same system as your corvette and cruiser; reshuffle. OR Deploy a cruiser (deploys -3) from Reserve Deck to same system as your corvette and frigate; reshuffle.',
